body: So ye, how will the staff tell you if your appeal for a ban is accepted?
body_tagged: So ye, how will the staff tell you if your appeal for a ban is accepted?
title: Find out if your appeal is accepted

replies.body: They will reply and say you are appealed? Or they go into deeper discussion with other staff
replies.body_tagged: They will reply and say you are appealed? Or they go into deeper discussion with other staff

replies.body: <u>Oh pk I thought they might like just un-ban u</u>
replies.body_tagged: <u>Oh pk I thought they might like just un-ban u</u>

reply_to.body: They will reply and say you are appealed? Or they go into deeper discussion with other staff
reply_to.body_tagged: They will reply and say you are appealed? Or they go into deeper discussion with other staff

replies.body: If you make an appeal, a Senior Staff member will notify you should it be successful or not by commenting on your appeal.
replies.body_tagged: If you make an appeal, a Senior Staff member will notify you should it be successful or not by commenting on your appeal.

replies.body: What happens if its been about 1 and a half weeks
replies.body_tagged: What happens if its been about 1 and a half weeks
